segments.text: Ugh, this kitchen is a total disaster right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water overflowing from the sink, splashing all over the place.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That puddle on the floor is gross, spreading everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot is right in it, soaking her shoe probably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just polishing that plate, ignoring the filthy mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinet doors are dripping wet, what a nasty sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids are up to no good, grabbing cookies like thieves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's stool is tilting in that slimy water area.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, it'll be into that yucky puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaching up, her hand might get sticky with crumbs.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole floor will be slippery and unclean soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the nice garden view can't make this appealing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I need to clean up just looking at it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked nearby, probably dirty too.
segments.speaker: PAR
